channel.title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra - Wizards In Winter
channel.description:
While watching Football today, I heard this pretty neat song. This large-amount peopled band made a really cool song called Wizards In Winter. The artist was Trans-Siberian Orchestra incase you didn't read it from the title. I thought I'd might as well share it with you all!
~Lin
If you don't have LimeWire, Rhapsody, I-tunes, Or you can't make it Dizzler for some strange unknown reason, I've uploaded it to MediaFire so you could download it. Enjoy!
[b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?eup2x4mazjl]Download[/url][/b]

item.title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra - Wizards In Winter
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:2, topic:167376”]I gotta say, from your first paragraph, I gathered this much information:

You were watching football. It was a neat song (this was repeated over three sentences).[/quote]I only found two =\ And you also forgot there were many people in the band. I’m not trying to make a point about that. And I was just trying to share the song with people, not give them a biography on the band.

Read full topic
